Use: Malware used by Group5 is capable of remotely deleting files from victims. [1]
Malware used by Group5 is capable of capturing keystrokes. [1]

Technique: Obfuscated Files or Information: Encrypted/Encoded File
Use: Group5 disguised its malicious binaries with several layers of obfuscation, including encrypting the files. [1]
Malware used by Group5 is capable of watching the victim's screen. [1]
